findings.title: Proper Reward Tokens Accumulation For Swap
findings.description: The `swapTokensForCake()` function does not properly accumulate reward tokens until they are large enough to be swapped, causing potential loss of rewards.

findings.title: Lack of Slippage Control in swapTokensForCake()
findings.description: The `MetaFinanceTriggerPool` contract lacks slippage control in its `swapTokensForCake()` function, allowing for potential loss due to price fluctuations during token swaps.

findings.title: Possible Assets Locked in SmartChef
findings.description: The `MetaFinanceTriggerPool` contract provides an interface for project administrator to withdraw user assets from the `SmartChef` pool at emergency, but its current implementation needs to be improved.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `MetaTrigger`, there are certain privileged administrators that play critical roles in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.
